SEARCH
Package main.java.controllers

Class CustomerOrderController

java.lang.Object
main.java.controllers.CustomerOrderController
public class CustomerOrderController extends Object
The CustomerOrderController class implements the business logic layer operations related to customer orders. It provides methods to create, modify, and manage customer orders. This class is part of a three-layer architecture, serving as the intermediary between the presentation layer (UI) and the data access layer (DAO).
Since:
24-Apr-2024
Version:
1.2
Author:
SDDA Team 1

      public Order chooseDineIn(Order customerOrder, boolean choice)
      Sets the dine-in status for the customer order.
      Parameters:
      customerOrder - The customer order to update
      choice - The dine-in status choice (true for dine-in, false for takeout)
      Returns:
      The updated Order object

      public Order addItem(Order customerOrder, MenuItem cartItem, int quantity, String comments)
      Adds items to the customer order with specified quantity and comments.
      Parameters:
      customerOrder - The customer order to update
      cartItem - The item to add to the order
      quantity - The quantity of the item to add
      comments - Any additional comments for the item
      Returns:
      The updated Order object

    • deleteItem

      public Order deleteItem(Order customerOrder, MenuItem cartItem, int quantity)
      Deletes items from the customer order with specified quantity.
      Parameters:
      customerOrder - The customer order to update
      cartItem - The item to remove from the order
      quantity - The quantity of the item to remove
      Returns:
      The updated Order object
